title.value: Researcher perspectives on ethics considerations in epigenetics: an international survey
title.justification: The title reflects the main focus of the research which is understanding the ethical considerations of researchers in epigenetics.
title.quote: Researcher perspectives on ethics considerations in epigenetics: an international survey

extractions.description: This paper explores the ethical, legal, and social implications (ELSI) of epigenetic research and technologies, based on a survey of 189 international researchers. The study identifies areas of consensus and divergence in the field, addressing concerns about applications in life insurance, forensics, immigration, and direct-to-consumer testing.

type.justification: The research involved conducting a survey of 189 epigenetic researchers to gather data on their perspectives, which is characteristic of empirical studies.
type.quote: This paper explores the views of epigenetic researchers about some of these discussions. From January to March 2020, we conducted an online survey of 189 epigenetic researchers working in 31 countries.

name.justification: The paper is centered on epigenetic research and the ethical considerations associated with this field.
name.quote: The field of epigenetics sheds light on molecular mechanisms involved in the regulation of gene expression.

name.justification: The paper places a strong emphasis on the ethical, legal, and social issues surrounding epigenetics.
name.quote: There is growing literature discussing the most promising opportunities, as well as arising ethical, legal and social issues (ELSI).
